alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 5:13PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Weld, southwestern Morgan and northeastern Adams Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 512 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Prospect Valley to 3 miles south of Twelve-Mile Corner, or along a line extending from 33 miles southeast of Greeley to 15 miles south of Fort Morgan. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wiggins, Prospect Valley, Hoyt, Adena and Roggen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County
